achieve.from sentence: CASCADE manages to achieve major improvement across all datasets with statistical significance .

comfortably beats.from sentence: CASCADE comfortably beats the state - of - the - art neural models CNN - SVM and CUE - CNN .

lowest performance.from sentence: The lowest performance is obtained by the Bag - of - words approach whereas all neural architectures outperform it .

Main imbalanced dataset.from sentence: Its improved performance on the Main imbalanced dataset also reflects its robustness towards class imbalance and establishes it as a real - world deployable network .

user embeddings.from sentence: Since CUE - CNN generates its user embeddings using a method similar to the ParagraphVector , we test the importance of personality features being included in our user profiling .

neural networks.from sentence: Amongst the neural networks , the CNN baseline receives the least performance .
